vi_translation: Do you have time to speak? When the Mechanical Dog catches you, in front of twelve to thirty million people, can you sum up your entire life in the past week in a single sentence or a single word that will stay with them long after the Mechanical Dog has turned back, clamped you in its metallic jaws, and leisurely walked away into the darkness, while the camera continues to remain still, observing that creature gradually becoming smaller and smaller in the distance, a beautifully fading scene! What can you say in just one word, a few words, that will scorch their faces and awaken them?
tr_translation: Would he be able to find time to speak? Before the hound grabbed him tightly with its metal-pincer teeth in front of the eyes of ten, twenty, or thirty million people, and pulled him into the darkness –magnificently as the screen faded out– while the camera fixed on him, would he be able to say a single sentence or a word summarizing his entire life or the events of the past week, something they would not forget for a long time? What could he say in a single word, in a few words, that would embarrass them and force them to think.
es_translation: Would he have time to speak when the Hound caught him, in front of ten, twenty, or thirty million people? Could he not summarize what his life had been like during the past week with a single phrase or a word that would stay with them long after the Hound had turned, holding him with its metal jaws, to move away into the darkness, while the camera remained still, focusing on the device that would grow smaller in the distance, to offer a splendid ending? What could he say in a single word, in a few words that would leave a mark on all their faces and make them wake up?
Sesotho: Na ho na le nako ea ho bua? Joalokaha Hound a mo tšoara, ka pono ea batho ba limilione tse leshome kapa mashome a mabeli kapa mashome a mararo, a ke ke a bala bophelo bohle ba hae bekeng e fetileng polelong e le 'ngoe kapa lentsoe le neng le tla lula le bona nako e telele ka mor'a moo. Hound o ne a reteleha, a mo hlakola mehareng ea eona ea tšepe-plier, 'me a lula a le lefifing, ha kh'amera e lula e eme, e shebile sebopuoa se fokotseha hole- e ntle e ea fela! Ke eng seo a ka se buang ka lentsoe le le leng, mantsoe a seng makae, a neng a tla emisa lifahleho tsohle tsa bona 'me a ba tsosa?
Yorùbá: Ṣé yóò ní àkókò fún ọ̀rọ̀? Bí Hound ṣe mú un, pẹ̀lú ìwòye àwọn ènìyàn mẹ́wàá tàbí ogún tàbí ọgbọ̀n mílíọ̀nù, ṣé kò lè ṣe àkópọ̀ gbogbo ìgbésí ayé rẹ̀ ní ọ̀sẹ̀ tó kọjá nínú gbólóhùn kan ṣoṣo tàbí ọ̀rọ̀ tí yóò dúró pẹ̀lú wọn fún ìgbà pípẹ́ lẹ́yìn náà. Hound ti yí padà, ó di ẹ̀gbọ́n irin rẹ̀ mú, ó sì rìn lọ nínú òkùnkùn, nígbà tí kámẹ́rà náà dúró, wíwo ẹ̀dá náà tí ó ń dínkù ní ọ̀nà jíjìn - ìparun tó dára! Kí ni ó lè sọ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ kan ṣoṣo, ọ̀rọ̀ díẹ̀, tí yóò yí gbogbo ojú wọn padà tí yóò sì jí wọn?
Setswana (Tswana): A o ne a na le nako ya go bua? Fa a ne a le mo dingwageng tse di fetileng, o ne a akanya gore o ne a tla nna le batho ba le dimilione di le 12 kgotsa 300, a ka se ka a tshela botshelo jotlhe jwa gagwe mo bekeng e le nngwe fela kgotsa lefoko le le neng le tla nna le lone morago ga nako e telele. O ne a mo raga, a bo a mo isitse mo lefifing, a bo a ntse a le mo lefifing, a bona sefikantswe se ne se le kwa tlase, se ne se le kwa tlase se se neng se le kwa godimo se se neng se le mo go sone! Ke eng se a ka se buang ka lefoko le le lengwe, mafoko a le mmalwa, a a neng a tla tlhoma difatlhego tsotlhe tsa bone le go di tsosa?
Reo Tahiti (Tahitian): E taime anei to ' na no te hoê oreroraa parau? Ia hi'o-ana'e-hia hoê ahuru e aore râ, e piti ahuru e aore râ, e toru ahuru milioni taata, eita paha oia e haapoto i to'na oraraa taatoa i te hepetoma i ma'iri a'e nei, i roto i te hoê noa pereota e aore râ, i te hoê parau o te vai noa i piha'i iho ia ratou e mea maoro i muri a'e i te reira. Ua fariu a'era o Hound, ma te tupa'i ia'na i roto i to'na taa, e ma te ou'au'a noa i roto i te poiri, a vai noa ai te pata hoho'a, a hi'o noa ai i te animala ia hee i te atea ê ! Eaha ta'na e nehenehe e parau i roto i te hoê noa ta'o, te tahi noa mau parau, o te faarapu i to ratou mau hoho'a mata atoa e o te faaara ia ratou ?
Maithili: की हुनका भाषणक लेल समय भेटत? जेना कि हाउंड ओकरा पकड़ि लेलक, दस या बीस या तीस करोड़ लोककेँ देखैत ओ अन्तिम सप्ताहमे अपन पूरा जीवनक सारांश एकटा वाक्यांश या कोनो एहन शब्दमे नहि कऽ सकैत छल जे ओकर बहुत दिन बाद हुनका लग रहत। हाउंड घुमि गेल छल, ओकरा अपन धातु-प्लायर जबड़ा मे पकड़ि लेलक, आ अन्हारमे घुमि गेल, जखन कि कैमरा स्थिर रहल, दूरसँ जीवकेँ घटैत देखैत रहल- एकटा शानदार फीका-आउट! ओ एक शब्दमे, किछु शब्दमे की कहि सकैत छलाह जे हुनकालोकनिक सभटा मुँह सीनिकऽ जगा देत?
Malagasy: Hanana fotoana hanaovana lahateny ve izy? Rehefa nosamborin'ny Hound izy, izay heverina ho olona folo na roapolo tapitrisa, dia mety tsy hamintina ny fiainany manontolo izy tamin'ny herinandro lasa tamin'ny fehezanteny iray na teny iray izay hitoetra ela aorian'izany. Nitodika i Hound, nandrovitra azy teo amin'ny valanoranony vita amin'ny vy, ary notrosafosafoina tao anatin'ny haizina, raha mbola nijanona tsy nijanona ny fakantsary, nijery ilay biby nibolisatra teny lavitra eny—fade-ivelany mahafinaritra! Inona no azony lazaina amin'ny teny tokana, teny vitsivitsy, izay hanozongozona ny endrik'izy ireo rehetra sy hamoha azy ireo?
Divehi (Dhivehi): ތަގުރީރަކަށް އޭނާއަށް ވަގުތު ލިބޭނެ ހެއްޔެވެ؟ ދިހަ ނުވަތަ ވިހި ނުވަތަ ތިރީސް މިލިޔަން މީހުންގެ ނަޒަރުގައި، ހައުންޑުން އެކަލޭގެފާނު ހިއްޕެވި ފަދައިން، ފާއިތުވި ހަފުތާގެ ތެރޭގައި، އެކަލޭގެފާނުގެ މުޅި ޙަޔާތް، އެންމެ ލަފުޒަކުން، ނުވަތަ އޭގެ މާގިނަ ދުވަސްތަކެއް ނުވެ، އެބޭކަލުންގެ އަރިހުގައި ދެމިތިބޭނެ ބަހަކުން، އެކަލޭގެފާނުގެ މުޅި ޙަޔާތް ބަޔާންނުކުރެއްވޭނެއެވެ. ހައުންޑް އެނބުރި، އޭނާގެ މެޓަލް-ޕްލެޔަރ ޖަވާހިރުގައި ހިފަހައްޓައި، އަނދިރިކަމުގެ ތެރޭގައި އެނބުރެމުން ދިޔައިރު، ކެމެރާ މަޑުމަޑުން ހުއްޓެވެ. ދުރުގައި އެ ދިރޭ ތަކެތި މަދުވަމުން ދިޔަތަން ފެނުނެވެ. އެންމެ ބަހަކުން، މަދު ބަހަކުން، އެމީހުންގެ ހުރިހާ މޫނުތަކެއް ހަލަބޮލިކޮށް، ހޭލާނެ ފަދަ ވާހަކައެއް އޭނާ ބުނާނީ ކީކޭ ހެއްޔެވެ؟

en: Out of a helicopter glided something that was not machine, not animal, not dead, not alive, glowing with a pale green luminosity. It stood near the smoking ruins of Montag's house and the men brought his discarded flame-thrower to it and put it down under the muzzle of the Hound. There was a whirring, clicking, humming.

tr_translation: From the helicopter, something that was not a machine, not an animal, not dead but also not alive, glowing with a faint green light, was being lowered. The Hound stood next to the smoking ruins of Montag's house, and the men brought the flamethrower that Montag had left, placing it under the Hound's nose. A buzz, a click, a whirring sound was heard.
es_translation: From the helicopter emerged something that was not a machine, an animal, something that was neither dead nor alive, something that glowed with a faint greenish luminosity. It remained next to the smoldering ruins of Montag's house, and the men brought his abandoned flamethrower and placed it under the Hound's snout. A hiss, a snort, a sound of gears was heard.
Sesotho: Ho tsoa helikopta glided ntho e neng e se mochine, eseng phoofolo, ha shoa, ha aa phela, khanyang le khanya e tala. E ile ea ema haufi le lithako tsa ho tsuba tsa ntlo ea Montag 'me banna ba ile ba tlisa lelakabe la hae le lahliloeng ka mollo ho lona ebe ba le beha fatše ka tlas'a muzzle ea Hound. Ho ne ho le monate, ho tobetsa, humming.

Setswana (Tswana): Go tswa mo helikoping go ne go na le sengwe se se neng se seyo mo motšhine, e seng phologolo, e seng e e suleng, e sa tlhole e tshela, e e phatsimang ka botala jo botala jo botala. E ne ya ema gaufi le ditshika tsa ntlo ya ga Montag mme banna ba ne ba mo isa kwa go yone molelo o o neng o le mo go lone mme ba o tsenya ka fa tlase ga lesoko la leswana. Go ne go na le sengwe se se neng se le teng, se ne se tshamekgile, se ne se tshwentswe.

Te ti'a noa ra te reira i piha'i iho i te mau vahi paparari o te fare o Montag, e ua afa'i mai te mau taata i ta'na pupuhi i ni'a i te reira e ua tuu atu i raro a'e i te marumaru o te pereoo auahi. Te vai ra te hoê ta'i, te pataraa, teǎpǎ.

Nisy ny fikorisàna, ny fikitikitihana, ny fitendrena.

Yorùbá: Ó dúró fún èémí, ní ọ̀nà rẹ̀ lọ sí odò, láti wo àwọn fèrèsé tí iná rẹ̀ kò mọ́lẹ̀ ti àwọn ilé tí wọ́n jí, ó sì rí àwòrán àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n wà nínú wọn tí wọ́n ń wo ògiri ilé ìgbafẹ́ wọn àti níbẹ̀ lórí ògiri Mechanical Hound, èémí vapour neon, tí wọ́n fọ́ pẹ̀lú, níbí ó sì lọ, níbí ó sì lọ! Ní báyìí ní Elm Terrace, Lincoln, Oak, Park, àti lókè ọ̀nà sí ilé Faber.
Setswana (Tswana): O ne a emisa go hema, fa a ya kwa nokeng, go ya kwa ntlong e e neng e le metsi a a neng a agilwe, mme a bona di-silhouettes tsa batho ba ba mo teng ba lebile dipota tsa bone tsa parlour le gona mo maboteng a Mechanical Hound, moya wa neon vapour, spidered along, here and gone, here and gone! Go go, go go
Reo Tahiti (Tahitian): Ua faaea oia no te huti i te aho, a haere ai oia i roto i te anavai, no te hi'o na roto i te mau haamaramarama mohimohi o te mau fare, e ua ite oia i te mau hoho'a mata o te mau taata i roto i te mataitairaa i to ratou mau patu e i nia i te mau papai o te Mechanical Hound, te hoê hutiraa aho o te neon hound, te fee, i ǒ nei e te reva, i ǒ nei e a reva ' tu ai! Malagasy: Nijanona nifoka fofonaina izy, teny an-dalana ho any amin'ny renirano, mba hijery ny varavarankelin'ireo trano nofohazaina, ary nahita ireo sarin'ireo olona tao anatiny nijery ny rindrin'ny trano fonenany ary teo amin'ny rindrina ny Hound Mechanical Hound, fofonaina avy amin'ny orana neon, voasary teny an-dalana, teto ary lasa, teto ary lasa! tr_translation: “The police are asking all the residents of the Elm Terrace area to do the following. Everyone in every house on all the streets, open your front or back doors or look out your windows. If everyone looks outside from their homes in a minute, the fugitive will no longer be able to escape. Are we ready?”

The fugitive will not be able to escape if, during the next minute, everyone looks from outside their house. Ready!

en: He floated on his back when the valise filled and sank; the river was mild and leisurely, going away from the people who ate shadows for breakfast and steam for lunch and vapours for supper. The river was very real; it held him comfortably and gave him the time at last, the leisure, to consider this month, this year, and a lifetime of years. He listened to his heart slow. His thoughts stopped rushing with his blood.

es: Cuando la maleta se llenó de agua y se hundió, Montag siguió flotando boca arriba; el río era tranquilo y pausado, mientras se alejaba de la gente que comía sombras para desayunar, humo para almorzar y vapores para cenar. El río era muy real, le sostenía cómodamente y le daba tiempo para considerar este mes, este año, y todo un transcurso de ellos. Montag escuchó el lento latir de su corazón. Sus pensamientos dejaron de correr junto con su sangre.

vi_translation: He lay on his back and floated as the suitcase filled with water and sank; the river was gentle and leisurely, drifting away from those who ate breakfast with shadows, lunch with steam, and dinner with smoke. The river was very real; it gently carried him along and ultimately gave him time, the leisure to reflect on this month, this year, and the many years of a lifetime. He listened to his heart beating softly. His thoughts no longer rushed along with his blood.
tr_translation: As the suitcase filled with water and sank, while floating on his back in the water, the river was gentle and lazy, and it was taking him away from the people who ate shadows for breakfast, steam for lunch, and mist for dinner. The river was very real; it relaxed him and finally gave him the opportunity to think about freedom, this month, this year, the years that filled a lifetime. He listened to the decrease in the palpitations in his heart. As the blood in his veins sped up, his thoughts stopped.
es_translation: When the suitcase filled with water and sank, Montag continued floating face up; the river was calm and slow, as he drifted away from the people who ate shadows for breakfast, smoke for lunch, and vapors for dinner. The river was very real, it held him comfortably and gave him time to consider this month, this year, and a whole passage of them. Montag listened to the slow beating of his heart. His thoughts stopped running along with his blood.
Sesotho: 'Me o ile a phalla ka mor'a hore a khutlele ka mor'a hae, 'me o ne a tletse le ho thothomela; Noka e ne e le bonolo ebile e phomola, e baleha batho ba neng ba ja meriti bakeng sa lijo tsa hoseng le mouoane bakeng sa lijo tsa mots'eare le vapours bakeng sa lijo tsa mantsiboea. Nōka e ne e le ea sebele; E ile ea mo tšoara ka boiketlo 'me ea mo fa nako ea ho qetela, boikhathollo, ho nahana ka khoeli ena, selemong sena le bophelo bohle ba lilemo. 'Me o ile a mamela pelo ea hae butle-butle. Maikutlo a hae a ile a emisa ho potlakela ka mali a hae.

Divehi (Dhivehi): އެކަލޭގެފާނުގެ ފުރަގަހުގައި އެކަލޭގެފާނު އޮޔާދިޔައެވެ. އެހިނދު، އެކަލޭގެފާނުގެ ހިތްޕުޅަށް އެ ވަޅުތައް ފުރި، އަޑިއަށް ހިނގައްޖެއެވެ. ހެނދުނުގެ ނާސްތާއަށް ހިޔަނި ކާ މީހުންނާއި މެންދުރުގެ ކެއުމަށް ސްޓީމް އަދި ރޭގަނޑުގެ ކެއުމަށް ބޭނުންވާ ސާމާނު ކާ މީހުންނާ ދުރަށް ދިޔަ ކޯރަކީ މަޑުމައިތިރި ކޯރެކެވެ. އެ ކޯރަކީ ވަރަށް ހަގީގީ ކޯރެކެވެ. ފަހެ، އެކަލޭގެފާނު އެކަލޭގެފާނުގެ އަރިހުގައި ހިފަހައްޓައިގެން ހުންނެވިއެވެ. އަދި އެކަލޭގެފާނަށް، މިމަހާއި، މިއަހަރާއި، މުޅި އުމުރުގެ އަހަރުތަކާމެދު ވިސްނައި، އެކަލޭގެފާނަށް ފުރުޞަތު ދެއްވިއެވެ. އޭނާގެ ހިތުގެ އަޑު މަޑުމަޑުން އަޑުއަހަމުން ދިޔައެވެ. އޭނާގެ ޚިޔާލުތައް އޭނާގެ ލޭގެ ސަބަބުން އަވަސްވުން ހުއްޓުނެވެ.

es: Un gamo. Montag olió el denso perfume almizclado y el olor a hierba del aliento del animal, en aquella noche eterna en que los árboles parecían correr hacia él, apartarse, correr, apartarse, al impulso de los latidos de su corazón.

This description evokes a sense of nature's response to human presence or emotion, which resonates with themes found in various literary works, particularly those that explore the relationship between humans and nature or the internal turmoil of a character. vi_translation: A deer. He smelled the pungent musk like a mixture of perfume and blood, and the sticky breath of the animal, the scent of cardamom, moss, and dog tongue grass in this vast night where the trees rushed towards him, retreated, rushed forward, retreated, in rhythm with the heartbeat behind his eyes.
tr_translation: A deer. Montag felt the mixed scent of musk and blood and the sticky breathing of the animal; in this immense night scented with cardamom, moss, and grass, all the trees seemed to come at him, retreating and advancing, tied to the heartbeat behind his eyes.
es_translation: A deer. Montag smelled the dense musky perfume and the scent of grass from the animal's breath, on that eternal night when the trees seemed to run towards him, move away, run, move away, driven by the beating of his heart.
Sesotho: Like a deer. 'Me o ile a nkha nkhang hamonate e boima musk-joaloka nkhang hamonate tsoakane le mali le gummed exhalation tsa phefumoloho ea phoofolo, tsohle cardamon le moss le ralwaed monko o monate bosiung bona bo boholo boo lifate li ileng tsa matha ho eena, hula, a matha, a fosoa, ho pulse ea pelo ka mor'a mahlo a hae.
Yorùbá: A deer. Ó gbóòórùn olóòórùn olóòórùn oló
Setswana (Tswana): A deer bone O ne a nkga monkgo o o bokete jaaka monkgo o o bokete o o tswakilweng ka madi, o ne o tshikinya phefumoloho ya phologolo, lotlhe ka cardamone le mose le monko o monate mo bosigong jo bo boitshegang jo ditlhare di neng di bo di tabogela kwa go ene, di tabogela, tsa tabogela, tsa gogela kwa godimo ga pelo ya gagwe kwa morago ga matlho a gagwe.

Maithili: एकटा हिरन। ओ खूनसँ मिलल भारी कस्तूरी सन इत्र आ जानवरक साँसक मसूड़ादार साँस छोड़बाक गंध लेलनि, एहि विशाल रातिमे सभ कार्डमैन आ काई आ रैगवीडक गंध जतय गाछसभ ओकरा दिस दौड़ल, खींचि लेलक, दौड़ल, दूर खींचलक, ओकर आँखिक पाछाँ हृदयक नाड़ी धरि।

tr_translation: He paused to take a breath; the more he breathed, the more he inhaled the air of the earth and filled himself with its details. He was not empty. There was enough here to fill him adequately. There would always be more than enough.

en: The innocent man stood bewildered, a cigarette burning in his hand. He stared at the Hound, not knowing what it was. He probably never knew. He glanced up at the sky and the wailing sirens. The cameras rushed down. The Hound leapt up into the air with a rhythm and a sense of timing that was incredibly beautiful. Its needle shot out. It was suspended for a moment in their gaze, as if to give the vast audience time to appreciate everything, the raw look of the victim's face, the empty street, the steel animal a bullet nosing the target.

es: El inocente permaneció atónito; un cigarrillo ardía en una de sus manos. Se quedó mirando al Sabueso, sin saber qué era aquello. Probablemente, nunca llegó a saberlo. Levantó la mirada hacia el cielo y hacia el sonido de las sirenas. Las cámaras se precipitaron hacia el suelo. El Sabueso saltó en el aire con un ritmo y una precisión que resultaban increíblemente bellos. Su aguja asomó. Permaneció inmóvil un momento, como para dar al inmenso público tiempo para apreciarlo todo: la mirada de terror en el rostro de la víctima, la calle vacía, el animal de acero, semejante a un proyectil alcanzando el blanco.
es_results: The passage provided seems to describe a dramatic and suspenseful scene, possibly involving a chase or a moment of high tension. vi_translation: The innocent man stood there bewildered, holding a half-burnt cigarette. He stared at the Robot Dog, not knowing what it was. Perhaps he would never know. He looked up at the sky, where the sirens were blaring loudly. The camera swooped down. The Robot Dog leaped into the air with an incredibly graceful rhythm and timing. Its needle shot out. The needle hung there for a moment in their gaze, as if to give the large audience enough time to fully grasp everything, the very real expression on the victim's face, the empty street, the steel creature like a bullet sniffing its prey.
tr_translation: The innocent man with a burning cigarette in his hand stood in shock. He looked at the Hound without knowing what was happening. Perhaps he had never known. He looked at the sky and the blaring sirens. The cameras approached him. The Hound leaped into the air with incredible rhythm and timing. Its needle extended, as if it hung in the air for a moment so the audience could see everything: the pained expression on the victim's face, the empty street, the steel animal advancing like a bullet towards its target.
es_translation: The innocent man remained astonished; a cigarette burned in one of his hands. He stood staring at the Hound, not knowing what it was. He probably never came to know. He looked up at the sky and towards the sound of the sirens. The cameras plummeted to the ground. The Hound leaped into the air with a rhythm and precision that were incredibly beautiful. Its needle protruded. It remained still for a moment, as if to give the immense audience time to take it all in: the look of terror on the victim's face, the empty street, the steel animal, like a projectile hitting its target.

Divehi (Dhivehi): ކުށެއް ނެތް މީހާ ހައިރާންވެފައި ހުއްޓެވެ. އޭނާގެ އަތުގައި ސިނގިރޭޓެއް އަނދަމުން ދިޔައެވެ. އެއީ ކޮން އެއްޗެއްކަން ނޭނގި އޭނާ ހައުންޑަށް ބަލަހައްޓައިގެން ހުއްޓެވެ. އޭނާއަށް ދުވަހަކުވެސް ނޭނގޭނެއެވެ. އޭނާ އުޑުމަތި ބަލައިލިއިރު ރޮމުން ދިޔަ ސައިރަންތަކަށް ބަލައިލެވުނެވެ. ކެމެރާތައް އަވަސްވެގަތެވެ. ހައުންޑް ވައިގެ ތެރެއަށް ފުންމާލީ ރިދަމަކާއި ޓައިމިންގެ އިހުސާސްތަކާއެކު ނުހަނު ރީތިކޮށެވެ. އޭގެ ސޫރަ ނިކުމެގެން ދިޔައެވެ. އެ މީހުންގެ ނަޒަރުގައި ހިނދުކޮޅަކަށް ސަސްޕެންޑްކުރީ، ބޮޑު އޯޑިއަންސަށް ހުރިހާ ކަމެއް ތައުރީފުކުރަން ވަގުތު ދިނުމުގެ ގޮތުންނާއި، އަނިޔާ ލިބުނު މީހާގެ މޫނުގެ ރޯ ލުކާއި، ހުސް މަގު، ސްޓީލް ޖަނަވާރަކީ ޓާގެޓަށް ބުލެޓެއް ޖައްސައިދޭ އެއްޗެއް ފަދައިންނެވެ.

Yorùbá: "Ìwò rẹ tó. O kò tí ì rí ara rẹ nínú dígí lẹ́nu ọjọ́ mẹ́ta yìí. Lẹ́yìn ìyẹn, ìlú náà kò bìkítà púpọ̀ nípa wa rí láti dààmú pẹ̀lú ìlépa ńlá bí èyí láti wá wa. Awọn crackpots diẹ pẹlu awọn ẹsẹ ni ori wọn ko le fi ọwọ kan wọn, ati pe wọn mọ ọ ati pe a mọ ọ; Gbogbo ènìyàn ló mọ̀ ọ́n. Níwọ̀n ìgbà tí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ènìyàn kò bá rìn kiri nípa sísọ̀rọ̀ Magna Charta àti òfin, ó dára. Àwọn panápaná náà tó láti yẹ ìyẹn wò, nísinsìnyí àti lẹ́yìn náà. Rárá, àwọn ìlú ńlá náà kò yọ wá lẹ́nu. Ati pe o dabi apaadi. "
Setswana (Tswana): Lebang Kwanele Ga ke ise ke tsamaye ke iteba mo seiponeng. Le fa go ntse jalo, motse ono ga o ise o ke o re tshwenye ka sepe se se ka re tshwenyang ka tsela e e tshwanang le eno. 12Dipotshôsa tse di mo ditlhogong tsa tsona di ka se kgone go di ama, mme di a itse, mme re a di itse; Botlhe ba itse. Le fa go ntse jalo, fa batho ba le bantsi ba sa kgone go bua ka Ga-Magna Charta le Molao wa Motheo, go siame. Go ne go na le batho ba ba neng ba le mo tseleng go bona gone jaanong le ka nako eo. Metse ya rona e ka se re tshwenye. "Hell ya lookin' as that."
Reo Tahiti (Tahitian): " Ua nava'i to oe hi'oraa. Aita outou i ite a'e nei ia outou iho i roto i te hoê hi'o. Taa ê atu i te reira, aita te oire i tâu'a rahi a'enei ia matou no te haapeapea i te hoê tapaparaa rahi mai teie te huru no te imi ia matou. Te vai ra te tahi mau irava i roto i to ratou upoo aita e nehenehe e tape'a ia ratou, e ua ite ratou i te reira e ua ite tatou i te reira ; ua ite te mau taata atoa i te reira. Mai te peu e eita te huiraatira rahi e hahaere noa ma te faahiti i te Magna Charta e te Pǎpǎ ture, e mea maitai roa ïa. Ua navai noa te feia tupohe auahi no te hi'opoa i te reira, i teie nei e i muri iho. Aita, aita te mau oire e haapeapea ra ia tatou. E e au oe mai hade ".
Maithili: "अहां के देखब काफी अछि। अहां अपना के हाल मे दर्पण मे नहि देखलहुं। एकर अतिरिक्त, शहर हमरासभकेँ तकबाक लेल एहि तरहक विस्तृत पीछासँ परेशान होयबाक लेल हमरासभक एतेक परवाह कहियो नहि कयलक। माथमे छंद बला किछु क्रैकपॉट ओकरा छू नहि सकैत अछि, आ ओ एकरा जनैत छथि आ हमसभ एकरा जनैत छी; सभ एकरा जनैत अछि। जाबत धरि विशाल जनसंख्या मैग्ना चार्टा आ संविधानक उद्धरण करबामे नहि भटकैत अछि, ई सब ठीक अछि। अग्निशामक दल एकर जाँच करबाक लेल पर्याप्त छल, कखनहु-कखनहु। नहि, शहर हमरा परेशान नहि करैत अछि। आ अहां नरक जकां लगैत छी।
Malagasy: "Ampy izay ny fijerinao. Tsy mbola nahita ny tenanao tao amin'ny fitaratra ianao tato ho ato. Ankoatra izany, tsy dia niraharaha loatra ny momba anay ny tanàna mba hanelingelina anay amin'ny fanenjehana goavana tahaka izao mba hahitana anay. Tsy afaka mikasika azy ireo ny triatra vitsivitsy misy andinin-tsoratra masina ao an-dohany, ary fantatr'izy ireo izany ary fantatsika izany; Fantatry ny rehetra izany. Raha mbola tsy mirenireny amin'ny fitanisàna ny Magna Charta sy ny Lalàm-panorenana ny vahoaka marobe, dia tsy maninona izany. Ampy ny mpitandro filaminana mba hanamarinana izany, ankehitriny sy avy eo. Tsia, tsy manelingelina anay ny tanàna. Ary ianao dia tahaka ny afobe. "
Divehi (Dhivehi): ބައްޕަގެ ނަޒަރު ފުދެއެވެ. މިފަހަކަށް އައިސް އައިރާއަކުން އަމިއްލަ ނަފްސު ފެނިފައެއް ނުވެއެވެ. އެއަށްވުރެ އިތުރަށް، އަޅުގަނޑުމެން ހޯދުމަށްޓަކައި މިކަހަލަ ތަނަވަސް ފަހަތުން، އަޅުގަނޑުމެންނާ ދޭތެރޭގައި އެހާ ބޮޑު ފަރުވާލެއް އެ ސިޓީން ނުގެންގުޅެއެވެ. ބޮލުގައި އާޔަތްތައް ހުރި ބައެއް ކްރެކްޕޮޓްތަކަށް އެތަކެތީގައި އަތްނުލެވޭނެއެވެ. އަދި އެއުރެންނަށް އެކަން އެނގެއެވެ. އަދި ތިމަންރަސްކަލާނގެ ދެނެވޮޑިގެންވަމެވެ. އެކަން އެންމެންނަށް ވެސް އެނގެއެވެ. ބޮޑު އާބާދީ މެގްނާ ޗާޓާ އާއި ގާނޫނު އަސާސީއާ ހަވާލާ ދީގެން ނޫޅެވޭހާ ހިނދަކު، ހުރިހާ ކަމެއް ވެސް ރަނގަޅެވެ. ފަޔަރމަނުން ވެސް އެކަން ޗެކްކުރަން ފުދެއެވެ. އެހެންވީމާ، ސިޓީތަކުން އަޅުގަނޑުމެންނަކަށް އުނދަގޫނުވޭ. އަދި ތިޔަބައިމީހުން ފެންނަނީ ނަރަކައެއް ފަދައިންނެވެ.
